subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Hirscher, the men’s giant slalom leader, earned his fourth straight World Cup victory in the discipline with a win in Garmisch-Partenkirchen, Germany.
snippet: Hirscher, the men’s giant slalom leader, earned his fourth straight World Cup victory in the discipline with a win in Garmisch-Partenkirchen, Germany.
